name: Inverse Design
definition: The capability of the Pilot to autonomously discover the micro-parameters required to generate a specific macro-emergent phenomenon (e.g., SOC) by inverting the TSF Library.
mechanism: Evolutionary Search (Genetic Algorithm) over the TSF Parameter Space.
implications: We do not need to manually tune parameters; we define the goal, and the Pilot finds the path.
This marks the transition from Science (Observation) to Engineering (Creation).
